project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, tracks user scores, and displays results at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Implement the question and answer structure
Create a function to present questions and options to the user
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Create functionality to display the score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
